component.name: nodecast
component.summary: Nodecast is a file sharing software using bittorrent protocol and based on qBitorrent code

description.p: Nodecast is a file sharing software using bittorrent protocol and based on qBitorrent code. It aims to be really simple by using spheres and respectful of private life.
It is programmed in C++ / Qt and uses libtorrent (sometimes called libtorrent-rasterbar) by Arvid Norberg. GeoLite data, created by MaxMind, are included in qBittorrent. Its features include:

ul.li: All Bittorrent extensions (DHT, Peer Exchange, Full encryption, Magnet/BitComet URIs, ...)
